title: "Alluxio adds Posix and S3 support for faster analytics across its distribute file system"
excerpt: "Distributed file system developer Alluxio Inc. today added interfaces to Posix and Amazon Web Services Inc. S3 storage to its open-source Data Orchestration Platform, in a bid to make it easier for business intelligence and model training to be conducted using popular machine learning and analytics frameworks such as TensorFlow and PyTorch."
